medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive hearing loss and dizziness associated with autophony and aural fullness.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began progressively over years, with variability in onset age among family members. The mother presented with dizziness and hearing loss, while her daughter reported symptoms that started 8 years prior to her visit, including mild dizziness during migraine headaches.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hearing loss and similar auditory symptoms among family members. One mother had a previously diagnosed Chiari malformation.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of hearing loss is significant among first-degree relatives, with at least two members in multiple families presenting with similar complaints of auditory and vestibular symptoms.
